text:
-11-
January 84 - Male, 23, B.S., married, at present supervisor of radio-TV
production for a small college, desires position as news director, prod¬
uction manager or special-events producer in educational broadcasting.
Can also shoot, edit, and plan films, has experience with news, pro¬
gramming and writing. Desires locate in the East. $500/month.
January 85 - Program manager for commercial TV station with 7 years
experience as producer-director and administrator as well as program
manager, wants to be station manager of an ETV station. Male, 32, A.B.,
married. Location open. $9,500.
January 86 - Male, 30, married, presently employed as maintenance
supervisor at an ETV station, has also worked as an audio engineer and
trained many student engineers. Wants a position as audio or video
engineer, can work on kinescopes and operations. Location, salary,
open.
January 87 - Recent radio-TV graduate, now production assistant in an
ETV station wants similar position in another station, as a cutback in
operations threatens job security. Can direct and announce. Male, 22,
B.A., married. Location open. $350/month.
January 88 - Male, 26, married, to receive M.S. in radio-TV in February,
wishes a position leading to producer-director, production director,
or program manager in an ETV station. Will go anywhere. $4500.
January 89 - Producer-director in commercial TV desires similar position
in educational broadcasting. Has 6 years experience in radio; 6 in TV.
Is also a writer whose scripts won 2 national awards and a teacher.
Male, 32, married, M.A. Desires locate in the East. Salary open.
January SO - Experienced writer-producer, commentator, has his own
network programs, seeks educational broadcasting post in the West or
New England. Widely published writer on musical subjects. Male, 28,
married, Ph. D. Salary open.
January 91 - Male, 34, married, M.A. has done work as writer, producer,
film director and editor, and assistant director wants a similar position
in ETV. Has 9 years experience in films and commercial TV. Location
open. $65/wk.
January 92 - Male, 30, single, stage manager for New York theatrical
company, wants to produce-direct for ETV. Has 350 hours producing-
directing TV programs. Desires South or West, $50/wk.
